text: On 26 September 2022, a mass shooting happened at a school in Izhevsk, Udmurtia, in west-central Russia. Eighteen people were killed, and 23 others were wounded. The gunman, Artyom Kazantsev, committed suicide. ==References== Category:September 2022 events Category:2022 mass shootings Category:2020s mass shootings in Europe Category:2022 in Russia Category:School shootings in Europe Category:Udmurtia
title: Izhevsk school shooting
